categories.name: First Lines
prompts: The last thing I expected to see in the desert was a ship.
It wasn't the fall that scared her, but the sudden stop.
The old musician played a song that only ghosts could hear.
By the third day, the rain had washed away everything but the truth.
He found the map in a bottle, but it wasn't for any place on Earth.

categories.name: Characters
prompts: A retired librarian who secretly solves cold cases.
A chef who can taste emotions in food.
An astronaut who is afraid of heights.
A cartographer who maps cities that don't exist.
A silent monk who communicates only by writing on a small chalkboard.

categories.name: Scenarios
prompts: You wake up with the ability to speak a language you've never learned.
A mysterious package arrives containing an object that belongs to your future self.
You are the sole witness to an impossible crime.
You discover a hidden room in your house that changes every day.
An ancient tree in your backyard starts bearing fruit made of glass.
